Package net.royalur.rules.state

Class AbstractOngoingGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.rules.state.AbstractGameState<P,S,R>
net.royalur.rules.state.AbstractOngoingGameState<P,S,R>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
R - The type of rolls that may be stored in this game state.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameState<P,S,R>, OngoingGameState<P,S,R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovedGameState, RolledGameState, WaitingForMoveGameState, WaitingForRollGameState
public abstract class AbstractOngoingGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll> extends AbstractGameState<P,S,R> implements OngoingGameState<P,S,R>
A game state representing a single point within an ongoing game.

      Parameters:
      board - The state of the pieces on the board.
      lightPlayer - The state of the light player.
      darkPlayer - The state of the dark player.
      turn - The player who made an action or that should make an action.
